name: groon groon, babey!
description:
"groon groon, babey" -  fast and furious probably

come get ur speed on with up to 4 friends and bounce and fly around the world of groon groon.

--CONTROLS (KEYBOARD / XBOX)--

wasd / left stick: navigate menu

a & d / left stick: steer

w / rt: accelerate

space / a: use item

s / b: reverse

----

xbox controllers required for multiplayer 

(in browser multiplayer is windows only)

builds for all operating systems below

created all by me over 3 weeks for #agbic2019
